description: {beacon} Energy & Environment Energy & Environment   The Big Story  Exits from Calif. deal could create window for newbies As the nation’s major truckmakers seek to abandon California’s stricter-than-federal emissions rules, experts are weighing whether this U-turn could allow new players to disrupt the market. © AP Photo/Sue Ogrocki “All your competitors just announced...

description: Sen. Ruben Gallego (D-Ariz.) pushed back against Democratic criticism of New York City mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani in an interview that aired Sunday. “It seems like the center-left of the party is like, attacking him,” Dennis Welch, a journalist with the local outlet Arizona’s Family, said. “Yeah, I don't know why they're — I don't...
title: Gallego slams Democratic criticism of Mamdani: ‘Shrinking our tent as much as possible'

author: Jonathan Easley
description: Plus: Texas Dems return, ending redistricting standoff {beacon} PRESIDENT TRUMP and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky were cordial in front of the cameras for their high-stakes summit in the Oval Office on Monday, despite key differences over how to bring an end to the Russia-Ukraine war. title: Trump and Zelensky play nice, despite differences

author: Elizabeth Crisp
description: Confidence in the US government's ability to ensure food safety has dropped to a new low, driven largely by distrust among Democrats, according to a Gallup poll released Monday.
title: Fewer Americans than ever confident in food safety regulations: Gallup

author: Caroline Vakil
description: The Texas House signaled it would move quickly on redistricting and other legislative matters after reaching a quorum on Monday afternoon following the return of Democrats who had fled the state in protest against GOP efforts to push through a new congressional map. “No one here needs a reminder that the last few weeks have...
title: Texas House signals it will 'move quickly' on redistricting with Democrats back

author: Tom Jurkowsky, opinion contributor
description: The Major Richard Star Act is a bipartisan bill that would correct an injustice to combat-injured veterans by allowing them to receive both their full retirement pay and disability compensation, and it is supported by many lawmakers in both the House and Senate.
title: Congress must correct an injustice facing combat-injured veterans

description: It is crucial that local law enforcement is equipped and empowered to address crimes stemming from locally operated drones.
title: Rogue drones are a ticking time bomb — let police intervene

description: It’s Monday. D.C. residents, have you noticed the increased law enforcement presence? How have you felt about it? Have any photos of it? Send them my way! title: The future of freight: A national framework for autonomous trucking

description: President Trump has outlined specific parameters for Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky to pursue peace with Russia, including giving up Crimea and not pursuing NATO membership, ahead of a high-stakes meeting at the White House.

author: Ella Lee
description: A coalition of Democratic-led states on Monday sued the Trump administration over its bid to condition federal funding for crime victims on cooperation with immigration enforcement. The lawsuit claims the Office for Victims of Crime, housed within the Justice Department, established a new policy barring access to Victims of Crime Act (VOCA) funds unless the...
title: Dem AGs sue over Trump administration bid to block crime victim funds over immigration

description: Several top Senate Democrats are urging President Trump to walk back a deal with Nvidia and AMD that would allow the companies to sell artificial intelligence (AI) chips to China after they agreed to share 15 percent of revenue from sales.  Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer (D-N.Y.) and Sens. Mark Warner (D-Va.), Jack Reed (D-R.I.),...

description: At some point in the degradation of science, there must be a line that ethical administrators will not cross.
title: Credible scientists can't hold up Kennedy's charade for much longer

description: President Trump is scheduled Monday to meet Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and a host of European leaders at the White House. Trump appears set to pressure Zelensky into accepting a peace agreement based on terms he discussed with Russian President Vladimir Putin during their summit in Alaska on Friday.  Zelensky...

description: The three “deals” are not trade agreements in any meaningful sense.

description: White House trade adviser Peter Navarro said India must stop buying and selling Russian oil if it wishes to garner favor with the Trump administration, which has upped tariffs on New Delhi to 50 percent. author: Caroline Vakil
description: House Speaker Mike Johnson (R-La.) slammed California Democrats’ proposed House map on Monday, saying he’s taking measures to stop the new congressional lines from advancing. “Democrats across the nation have played politics with redistricting for decades, and this is just the latest example. Republicans who are following state and federal laws will not be lectured...

description: A man has been arrested after allegedly ramming an ATV into an officer with Washington, D.C.’s police department earlier this year, according to the U.S. Marshals Service. title: Man arrested after allegedly ramming ATV into DC officer in March
